channel.title: Snowballs
channel.description:
A small game I'm developing in my free time.
What? 1 computer -> is the server, shows the game android device -> controller (you can set the amount of players (=devices) yourself)
Android: [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/v/t1.0-9/1381437_10205285400753401_1372926712347848493_n.jpg?oh=419450fb55417e9a0c4f2920caae3020&oe=54E0DD0A&__gda__=1427855667_889dcd04339177b13b7195f10c455ad9[/img]
Computer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UztlJVZlRvg The game may look slow in the video but it actually runs smooth at about 60FPS.
At the moment I'm creating a thread for each client but in a future update I'll replace it by using NIO (channel & selector) which I am trying to get a grip on right now.
